text.section:
A mediator may be used in the collective bargaining process whenever:
the Commission and the employee organization agree to mediation; or
an impasse results, and the Commission or the employee organization requests mediation.

section.section: The mediator shall be selected jointly by the Commission and the employee organization from a list supplied by the American Arbitration Association or the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service.
If the Commission and the employee organization are unable to agree on the selection of a mediator, the labor relations administrator shall select the mediator.

text.section: The Commission and the employee organization shall share equally the costs of mediation.
